statements: SELECT * FROM employee_compensation WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, salary FROM employee_compensation WHERE bonus > 5000;
SELECT * FROM employee_compensation WHERE salary < 50000 ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, position, salary, bonus FROM employee_compensation WHERE bonus IS NOT NULL;
SELECT position, employee_name FROM employee_compensation WHERE salary BETWEEN 40000 AND 60000;
SELECT * FROM employee_compensation WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employee_compensation WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_name, salary, bonus FROM employee_compensation WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM employee_compensation WHERE position LIKE '%Engineer%';
SELECT employee_name, salary + bonus AS total_compensation FROM employee_compensation WHERE salary > 70000;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, position FROM Employees WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT last_name, position FROM Employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM Employees ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, salary FROM Employees WHERE position LIKE '%Developer%';
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, position FROM Employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_id, last_name, salary FROM Employees WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT * FROM Employees ORDER BY position DESC, salary ASC;
SELECT * FROM SalaryStructure WHERE min_salary BETWEEN 50000 AND 70000;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, salary FROM employees WHERE department_id = 2;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, salary FROM employees ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department_name FROM employees INNER JOIN departments ON employees.department_id = departments.department_id;
SELECT employee_name, salary FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_name, salary FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department_id = 2 AND salary BETWEEN 40000 AND 60000;
SELECT e.employee_name, d.department_name FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.department_id = d.department_id;
SELECT employee_name, salary, department_name FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department_id = departments.department_id WHERE salary > 60000;
SELECT employee_name, salary, department_name, manager_id FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department_id = departments.department_id WHERE salary < 50000 ORDER BY department_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee;
SELECT name, department FROM employee WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_id, name, position FROM employee WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM performance_review ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT employee_id, salary FROM salary_history WHERE effective_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employee WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT name, salary FROM employee WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_id, salary FROM employee ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee JOIN performance_review ON employee.employee_id = performance_review.employee_id WHERE performance_rating > 4.0;
SELECT employee.name AS employee_name, salary_band.description AS band_description FROM employee JOIN salary_band ON employee.salary BETWEEN salary_band.lower_limit AND salary_band.upper_limit;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, salary FROM employees WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM bonuses ORDER BY bonus_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, amount AS salary_amount FROM employees JOIN salaries ON employees.employee_id = salaries.employee_id;
SELECT new_job_title, promotion_date FROM promotions WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, salary, department_id FROM employees WHERE department_id = 1 ORDER BY salary DESC;

SELECT employee_name, amount AS salary_amount, promotion_date FROM employees INNER JOIN salaries ON employees.employee_id = salaries.employee_id INNER JOIN promotions ON employees.employee_id = promotions.employee_id WHERE salary > amount AND promotion_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, bonus_amount, bonus_date FROM employees LEFT JOIN bonuses ON employees.employee_id = bonuses.employee_id WHERE bonus_amount > 1000 ORDER BY bonus_date ASC;

SELECT employee_name, employee_id, department_name FROM employees INNER JOIN departments ON employees.department_id = departments.department_id WHERE department_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY department_name, employee_name DESC;
